properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 5 at 6:59PM CST until February 7 at 6:55AM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the
following rivers in Middle Tennessee...

Stones River Near Donelson affecting Davidson County

. Recent rainfall and releases from Percy Priest Dam have caused the Stones River
near Donelson to rise above Action Stage, and should stay above Action Stage over
the next day or two.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Stones River Near Donelson
* At 06PM Wednesday the stage was 20.3 feet.
* Action stage is 20.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 35.0 feet.
* At 20.0 feet...Portions of the Stones River Greenway between Percy Priest Dam and   Lebanon Road are inundated.
* At 23.0 feet...Sections of the Stones River Greenway are impassable between Percy Priest Dam and Lebanon Road...and low lying areas along the river are inundated near the park on Jackson Downs Blvd.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
